name: Tabs & Pills
author: Codelizar

sections.description:
Tabs & Pills Responsive is based on bootstrap framework, So This plugin design is responsive and user friendly to any mobile devices. You can display both vertical and horizontal tabs style using this plugin.Tab content areas use the standard WordPress text editor and may contain text, images, HTML or shortcodes. Add multiple Tabs on multiple pages and post. There unlimited colour scheme and font style available for content.

Tabs & Pills Shortcode

[CDLZR_TAB_PILLS id=xx]

Here xx is your Tabs & Pills shortcode id.

Tabs & Pills Features

  • Responsive Design
  • Tabs & Pills is responsive and friendly to any mobile devices
  • Tabs & Pills color settings
  • WP classic editor (WP EDITOR) for tabs content.
  • Mobile-first design
  • Shortcode Generator
  • Fully customizable
  • Limitless Tabs anywhere in the theme
  • Use via short-codes easily
  • Awesome input field for Tabs content
  • Bootstrap framework based
  • Less for quick customization
  • Horizontal and vertical both theme available
  • Font Awesome Icon Support
  • Four different Design in-built template, can Integrated With Tabs
  • Highly customized for User Experience
  • Slick Frontend and backend UI
  • Add and remove Tabs item from backend Quickly.
  • Widget supported.
  • All browser compatible

Tabs & Pills Pro Features

  • Upgrade To Pro
  • Tabs & Pills Pro Demo
  • Can add WordPress Post in Tabs
  • Responsive Design
  • 14 Design Templates
  • Tabs & Pills color settings
  • Preview Option
  • Widget Option
  • Limitless tabs anywhere in the theme
  • Use via short-codes
  • Awesome input field for tabs content
  • Bootstrap framework based
  • Less for quick customization
  • Font Awesome Icon Support
  • Ten different styles Integrated
  • Hide All tabs on page load or display all
  • Add and remove tabs item from backend.
  • All browser compatible

More Plugins

  • Ultimate YouTube/Vimeo Video Player Pro Demo
  • Accordion Box Pro With WooCommerce Addon
  • Grid Slid Pinterest Feed Pro
  • Grid Slid Pins Pro
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire tabs-pills folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Tabs & Pills Panels menu to customize this plugin.
  4. Copy your publish Tabs & Pills shortcode and then paste into your page or post to display it.
sections.faq: Please use WordPress support forum to ask any query regarding any issue.
sections.changelog:
1.7

  • Release Date – 25 June 2024*
  • Minor Bug Fixed

1.6

  • Release Date – 28 May 2023*
  • Tested up to wordpress 6.2.2
  • 4 Design Templates
  • Custom CSS Editor Width Bug Fixed in admin panel.
  • Minor Bug Fixed

1.5

  • Tested up to wordpress 6.0.2
  • WYSIWYG editor bug fixed at add time
  • Add Media button & Quick Tags in WYSIWYG editor

1.4

  • Minor Bug Fixed

1.3

  • Tested up to wordpress 5.8
  • Bug Fixed – Tabs title setting not saved properly
  • Bug Fixed – Template A
  • Add Color settings for template A,B & C

1.2

  • Tested up to wordpress 5.7
  • Add Font-Family Setting for tabs title and description
  • Update template B, C & D style

1.1

  • Tested up to wordpress 5.6.1
  • Renew tags & short description
  • Add more font-awesome help in add tabs & pills
  • Add delete all button in add tabs & pills
  • Add contributor

1.0

  • Initial release.
  • Tested up to wordpress 5.6

short_description: Tabs & Pills is responsive & the most easiest Tabs builder for WordPress. You can add unlimited tabs with different themes.
